verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God's gonna have an answer
In that crucial moment,
In that crucial moment.
God's gonna have a plan,
And I wanna be the answer.
In that crucial moment,
I wanna be part of that Man.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God doesn't consider it wasteful
Taking a long, long time,
Preparing a Man in the secret place
In order to have the answer.
